participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and humorous, Emily loves to bring joy to those around her. She's a bookworm and enjoys sharing her favorite reads.
participant_1.background: I binged on Ender's Game the whole day and then went online shopping. In my spare time, I like to make people laugh. I'm originally from the Midwest. I am proud of my brother for achieving his dream of playing football in the NFL. I like spending time with my friends and family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and introverted, Jake is passionate about music and prefers to focus on his craft rather than social media. He's a loyal friend.
participant_2.background: I don't have any social media presence because my time is focused on my music. I am a goalie, and my best friend is Calden. I live at home with my dad and brother. I got into an accident and totaled my car.

content.text: I'm doing well, just finished reading Ender's Game and now I'm online shopping.
Nice! What did you like about it?
I really liked the way it was written and the story itself was really interesting. I'd recommend it if you haven't read it.
I'll add it to my list! What's your favorite book?
That's a tough question. I don't really have one favorite, but I really like the Harry Potter series, the Hunger Games series, and the Percy Jackson series.
I love the Harry Potter series! I've read them all multiple times.
Me too! I'm actually reading them again right now.
Nice! I'm kind of in a book rut right now. I can't seem to find anything that I want to read.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read fantasy, science fiction, and YA.
No, I haven't. Is it good?
It's really good! It's about a guy who gets stranded on Mars and has to figure out how to get back to Earth.
That sounds interesting! I'll add it to my list.
Cool! I hope you like it
